HomePage.hero_desc: Get recommendations and rewards while reading books.
HomePage.featureslisticle_feat1_sub1: Get rewarded for reading your favorite books
HomePage.featureslisticle_feat1_sub2: Earn points when you rate and review
HomePage.featureslisticle_feat2_sub3: Based on ratings, comments and personal preferences
HomePage.featureslisticle_feat3_sub1: Track your books by status: To read, Reading or Finished
HomePage.featureslisticle_feat5_sub1: Key stats on your reading habits
HomePage.featureslisticle_feat6_sub1: Import your library from Goodreads or Storygraph!
HomePage.problem_subtitle: I love fantasy and romance books... what's the best book for me?
HomePage.problem_tagline: Sign up to MyBookQuest for personalised recommendations.
HomePage.faq_question1: Why should I use MyBookQuest instead of Goodreads?
HomePage.faq_answer1: We are a 100% Free platform that recommends books based on YOUR tastes, we don't overpush you to impuulse buy books that don't suit your needs. We think that transparency is key.
HomePage.faq_question2: What are the main features of MyBookQuest?
HomePage.faq_answer2: Our goal is to provide a free, simple to use, curated platform to make the book reading and choosing process fast and fun so that you can spend your time reading instead of browsing!

ReadingRewards.base_reward_description: Get a coupon to buy any book on a trusted book selling website!

ReadingRewards.50%deal1_desc: Get a coupon to get a fiction book 50% OFF when you buy another one!

ReadingRewards.50%deal5_name: Buy One, Get One 50% Off Audiobooks

ImportData.goodreads_li1: Log In to your Goodreads account.
ImportData.goodreads_li3: Click 'Export Library' at the top of the page.

OnboardingPopup.step1_title: Are you coming from Goodreads or Storygraph?
OnboardingPopup.step1_content: Go to the profile page to import your data!
OnboardingPopup.step2_content: Select the book categories you're most interested in.
OnboardingPopup.step3_content: Start building your personal library by adding books you've read or want to read.
OnboardingPopup.step4_content: Based on your preferences and books, we'll provide personalized recommendations and exciting rewards!
